name: amigurumi ghost
notes:
you can find the free pattern on my website: https://littleloveeveryday.com/amigurumi-ghost-pattern/


skill level: easy/intermediate

the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge. you should be familiar with:
- magic ring
- single crochet
- half double crochet.
- double crochet.
- bobble stitch
- increase.
- invisible decrease.
- invisible fasten off.
- slip stitch.
working in front and back loops.

materials you will need:
• medium worsted weight yarn in white, purple, yellow, orange and brown.
• 3.5 mm crochet hook.
• 8 mm safety eyes.
• polyester fiberfill for stuffing.
• black embroidery thread and needle.
• tapestry needle, stitch marker, scissors.
